episodes.name: Good Cop / Bad Cop
episodes.overview: Hank and Marie try to spice up their relationship on Valentine's Day.

episodes.name: Wedding Day
episodes.overview: Walt and Hank have a talk before Hank gets married.

episodes.name: TwaüghtHammër
episodes.overview: Jesse and Badger make a behind the scenes video about their band "TwaughtHammer" and show a music video for their song "Fallacies."

episodes.name: Marie's Confession
episodes.overview: Marie records a video diary.

episodes.name: The Break-In
episodes.overview: Badger uses his lock-picking skills to help Walt (AKA Heisenberg) with some "B&E".

episodes.name: Live Saul Cam
episodes.overview: Surveillance camera footage showcasing what Saul does in his free time at his office, including receiving fellatio from a prostitute.

episodes.name: Fernando
episodes.overview: Fernando, accused of stealing a truck, appears in an advert for Saul.

episodes.name: Carl
episodes.overview: Carl's story about how Saul helped him with a problem involving his ex.

episodes.name: Wendy
episodes.overview: Wendy's story about how Saul got her out of jail.

episodes.name: Badger
episodes.overview: Badger recalls how Saul got him out of trouble after he was selling meth.

episodes.name: Wayfarer 515
episodes.overview: The advert that Saul used to appeal to victims of the Wayfarer 515 accident.

episodes.name: Letters to Saul
episodes.overview: Saul opens some letters that he receives from criminals.

episodes.name: Tiger Trouble? Better Call Saul!
episodes.overview: An advert Saul used to appeal to illegal tiger owners.

episodes.name: Saul Says: "Sue 'Em Now"
episodes.overview: An advert that Saul used to make people want to come to him to sue companies.

episodes.name: Team S.C.I.E.N.C.E.
episodes.overview: Jesse imagines all of his friends as one team, Team SCIENCE.

episodes.name: Fatty Fat Fat
episodes.overview: Saul appears in an advert which appeals to overweight people to come to him for advice on how to lose weight.

episodes.name: Fighting for You
episodes.overview: Saul's story about how two boxers came to him for compensation.

episodes.name: Snow Globe: A Breaking Bad Short
episodes.overview: Todd assembles a custom snow globe which includes his and Lydia's likenesses, as he tries to call her to ask her on a date.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: When an unassuming high school chemistry teacher discovers he has a rare form of lung cancer, he decides to team up with a former student and create a top of the line crystal meth in a used RV, to provide for his family once he is gone.

episodes.name: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse attempt to tie up loose ends. The desperate situation gets more complicated with the flip of a coin. Walt's wife, Skyler, becomes suspicious of Walt's strange behavior.

episodes.name: ...And the Bag's in the River
episodes.overview: Walter fights with Jesse over his drug use, causing him to leave Walter alone with their captive, Krazy-8. Meanwhile, Hank has a scared straight moment with Walter Jr..

episodes.name: Cancer Man
episodes.overview: Walter finally tells his family that he has cancer. Meanwhile, the DEA believes Albuquerque has a new, big time player to worry about. Jesse makes a surprise visit to his parents home.

episodes.name: Gray Matter
episodes.overview: Walter and Skyler attend a former colleague's birthday party. Jesse tries to free himself from drugs, while Skyler organizes an intervention.

episodes.name: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
episodes.overview: The side effects of chemo begin to plague Walt. Meanwhile, the DEA rounds up suspected dealers.

episodes.name: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
episodes.overview: Walter accepts his new identity as a drug dealer. Elsewhere, Jesse decides to put his aunt's house on the market and Marie throws Skyler a baby shower.

episodes.name: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse are reminded of Tuco’s volatile nature, and try to figure a way out of their business partnership. Hank attempts to mend fences between the estranged Marie and Skyler.

episodes.name: Grilled
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse find themselves in close quarters with an unhinged Tuco. Marie and Hank comfort Skyler, who is distraught over Walt’s disappearance. Hank pays a visit to Mrs. Pinkman on some not-so-official business.

episodes.name: Bit by a Dead Bee
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse cover their tracks, but as a result, both of their financial situations suffer. Meanwhile, Hank and his DEA colleagues may have a break in their meth investigation.

episodes.name: Down
episodes.overview: Walt tries to reconnect with his family. Still suspicious of her husband's actions, Skyler keeps her distance. Jesse finds himself without a place to live and struggles to cope.

episodes.name: Breakage
episodes.overview: Tensions and bills mount at the White household. Hank makes progress at work, but struggles with some residual effects from his encounter with Tuco. Jesse assembles a crew of dealers to get their product out on the streets.

episodes.name: Peekaboo
episodes.overview: Walt returns to work. Skinny Pete gets ripped off and when Jesse steps in, he gets more than he bargained for. Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment starts to collapse.

episodes.name: Negro y Azul
episodes.overview: Rumors fly about Jesse's recent actions as he and Walt discuss expanding their business into new territories. Hank struggles in El Paso. Skyler pursues a new job opportunity. Jesse gets to know his landlord, Jane.

episodes.name: Better Call Saul
episodes.overview: When Badger gets busted, Walt and Jesse seek the legal advice of a shady attorney, Saul Goodman. Hank returns to Albuquerque, but his troubled mental state and demeanor cause Marie to worry.

episodes.name: 4 Days Out
episodes.overview: The Whites await news about Walt's cancer treatment progress. Walt and Jesse retreat to the desert for a marathon cook.

episodes.name: Over
episodes.overview: Walt and Hank get into a fight, and Walt consumes himself with home improvements. Skyler opens up to her boss, Ted. Jane hides her relationship with Jesse from her father.

episodes.name: Mandala
episodes.overview: Saul proposes a new business partner. Skyler makes a disturbing discovery. Jesse divulges his real profession to Jane.

episodes.name: Phoenix
episodes.overview: The Whites welcome a new addition. Walter,  Jr. launches a website to aid his struggling family. Jesse's addiction spirals out of control.

episodes.name: ABQ
episodes.overview: Walt's lies have pushed Skyler to her limit. Jesse self-destructs after a personal blow, forcing Walt to come to his aid. Donald's grief leads to tragedy.

episodes.name: No Más
episodes.overview: As Walt copes with the aftermath of the plane crash and Skyler's anger, Jesse comes to a new realization. A new adversary tracks the elusive Heisenberg. Skyler seeks advice on the state of her marriage and confronts Walt.

episodes.name: Caballo sin Nombre
episodes.overview: Walt takes drastic action to bring his family back together. With Saul's help, Jesse makes an unexpected investment.

episodes.name: I.F.T.
episodes.overview: Walt ignores Skyler's demands, furthering the rift between them. Hank crosses a line at work.

episodes.name: Green Light
episodes.overview: Walt loses control. Hank throws himself into his blue meth investigation. Jesse enacts a new plan.

episodes.name: Más
episodes.overview: Gus tries to lure Walt back into business, forcing a rift between Walt and Jesse. Skyler doubts her new relationship. Marie confides in Skyler about her concern for Hank's well-being.

episodes.name: Sunset
episodes.overview: As Walt settles into his new surroundings, Walter, Jr. demands answers about his parents' relationship. Hank's investigation creates an immediate problem for Walt and Jesse.

episodes.name: One Minute
episodes.overview: Hank's increasing volatility forces a confrontation with Jesse and trouble at work. Skyler pressures Walt to make a deal. Gus' actions have severe consequences.

episodes.name: I See You
episodes.overview: The family waits for news about Hank. While Jesse covers at the lab, Walt attempts to placate Gus.

episodes.name: Kafkaesque
episodes.overview: As Hank's hospital bills stack up, Skyler hatches a plan. Walt and Gus come to a better understanding. Jesse pursues a new opportunity.

episodes.name: Fly
episodes.overview: Walt becomes obsessed with a contaminant in the lab. A frustrated Jesse attempts to get Walt back on track.

episodes.name: Abiquiu
episodes.overview: Skyler gets more involved in Walt's business. Hank struggles with his recovery. Jesse takes an active role in his new enterprise, leading him to a startling discovery.

episodes.name: Half Measures
episodes.overview: Jesse lashes out. Fearing for Jesse's safety, Walt takes drastic action to intervene. A tragic event leads to a shocking confrontation.

episodes.name: Full Measure
episodes.overview: With Jesse on the run, Walt negotiates a bargain with Gus and concocts a plan to provide for his and Jesse's safety.

episodes.name: Box Cutter
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse face the deadly consequences of their actions. Skyler deals with a puzzling disappearance, as Marie struggles to help Hank with his recovery.

episodes.name: Thirty-Eight Snub
episodes.overview: Walt attempts to form a new alliance as he plans his next move. Skyler pushes Walt towards a business opportunity, in hopes of protecting the family.

episodes.name: Open House
episodes.overview: Events spiral out of control at Jesse’s place. Skyler reluctantly asks for Saul’s help. Marie returns to an old pastime and a friend asks Hank for help.

episodes.name: Bullet Points
episodes.overview: The Cartel takes steps to gain the upper hand. Walt and Skyler share an embarrassing secret with the rest of the family. Jesse’s activities draw unwanted attention.

episodes.name: Shotgun
episodes.overview: When Jesse goes missing, Walt fears the worst. Skyler has an unlikely reunion. Hank shares some bad news with Detective Tim Roberts.

episodes.name: Cornered
episodes.overview: Skyler makes an unsettling discovery. Walter, Jr. pushes his dad into a questionable purchase. Jesse offers Mike some unexpected help.

episodes.name: Problem Dog
episodes.overview: A frustrated Walt gambles on a risky new plan.  Skyler's business venture hits a snag.  Hank recruits Walter, Jr. for an unusual outing.

episodes.name: Hermanos
episodes.overview: Skyler develops an unusual solution to her money troubles. Hank enlists Walt to investigate a theory. Walt’s impatience with Jesse grows.

episodes.name: Bug
episodes.overview: Skyler's past mistakes come back to haunt her. Gus takes action to thwart his rivals. Jesse seeks Walt's help, with mixed results.

episodes.name: Salud
episodes.overview: Walt's family worries when he doesn't turn up for Walter, Jr.'s 16th birthday.  Jesse is forced to put his lab skills to the test without Walt's help.

episodes.name: Crawl Space
episodes.overview: Walt takes drastic action to protect his secret and Gus. Skyler's efforts to solve Ted's financial problems hit a wall.

episodes.name: End Times
episodes.overview: Hank pushes Gomez to pursue one last lead, while Walt struggles to protect the family. Jesse gets alarming news and rushes to meet with Walt.

episodes.name: Face Off
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse team up to take on Gus. With Saul's help, Walt finds an unexpected ally.

episodes.name: Live Free or Die
episodes.overview: As Walt deals with the aftermath of the Casa Tranquila explosion, Hank works to wrap up his investigation of Gus' empire.

episodes.name: Madrigal
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse seek out an unlikely partner for a new business venture. The DEA follows up new leads in its investigation.

episodes.name: Hazard Pay
episodes.overview: Walt and Jesse put a business plan into action. Walt confesses a secret to Marie.

episodes.name: Fifty-One
episodes.overview: Walt celebrates another birthday. Skyler considers her options. An associate complicates Walt and Jesse's plan.

episodes.name: Dead Freight
episodes.overview: Walt's team must get creative to obtain the materials they need to continue their operation.

episodes.name: Buyout
episodes.overview: Walt, Jesse, and Mike struggle over the future of their business, as occupational hazards weigh on Jesse.

episodes.name: Say My Name
episodes.overview: Walt takes control of business matters as Mike grapples with the consequences of his actions.

episodes.name: Gliding Over All
episodes.overview: Walt ties up loose ends. Seeing the evidence of his success, he makes a startling and dangerous decision.

episodes.name: Blood Money
episodes.overview: As Walt and Jesse adjust to life out of the business, Hank grapples with a troubling lead.

episodes.name: Buried
episodes.overview: While Skyler's past catches up with her, Walt covers his tracks. Jesse continues to struggle with his guilt.

episodes.name: Confessions
episodes.overview: Jesse decides to make a change, while Walt and Skyler try to deal with an unexpected demand.

episodes.name: Rabid Dog
episodes.overview: An unusual strategy starts to bear fruit, while plans are set in motion that could change everything.

episodes.name: To'hajiilee
episodes.overview: Things heat up for Walt in unexpected ways.

episodes.name: Ozymandias
episodes.overview: Everyone copes with radically changed circumstances.

episodes.name: Granite State
episodes.overview: Events set in motion long ago move toward a conclusion.

episodes.name: Felina
episodes.overview: All bad things must come to an end.
